author: Ryan Sidle
description: What a career Xabi Alonso has had.
title: WATCH: Steven Gerrard Sends Touching Message To Retiring Xabi Alonso | SPORTbible

author: talkSPORT
description: Bayern Munich bid farewell to Xabi Alonso and Philipp Lahm today, two of the all-time great footballers. The pair announced their decision to retire earlier in the season and took to the Allianz Arena turf for one final time, in a 4-1 win over SC Freiburg, before hanging up their boots for good in the summer. Emotions were running high in Munich as celebrations for the Bundesliga title were also in full swing, with captain Lahm lifting his last league trophy.
title: In pictures: Bayern Munich bid farewell to Xabi Alonso and Philipp Lahm in final game before their retirement

author: FourFourTwo
description: Retiring Bayern Munich stars Philipp Lahm and Xabi Alonso should be proud of their exceptional careers, according to Pep Guardiola.
title: Guardiola lauds Bayern veterans Lahm and Alonso as Gerrard hails ex-colleague

author: FourFourTwo
description: As Philipp Lahm and Xabi Alonso ride off into the sunset, Carlo Ancelotti must trust Bayern's youngsters to preserve their dominance.
title: Familiar celebrations find Bayern at a standstill

author: FourFourTwo
description: Philipp Lahm and Xabi Alonso bowed out of professional football in Bayern Munich's 4-1 Bundesliga win over Freiburg.
title: Bayern Munich 4 Freiburg 1: Robben stars as champions bid farewell to Lahm and Alonso

author: FourFourTwo
description: Retiring in a blaze of glory at Bayern Munich was a lot to process for the great Spain midfielder Xabi Alonso.
title: Football will be a difficult gap to fill for Alonso

author: FourFourTwo
description: Xabi Alonso and Philipp Lahm were lauded by Bayern Munich coach Carlo Ancelotti.
title: Ancelotti praises 'fantastic' Alonso and Lahm

author: FourFourTwo
description: Philipp Lahm and Xabi Alonso will start against Freiburg before being substituted late on to allow the Bayern Munich fans to bid farewell.
title: Lahm, Alonso promised special Bayern farewell after 'very emotional' final training session

author: Spiegel Online
description: Die Abschiede von Philipp Lahm und Xabi Alonso sorgten bei der straff organisierten Bayern-Meisterfeier für große Gefühle. Ansonsten merkte man allen Münchnern die Routine an - außer Carlo Ancelotti.
title: Bayern Münchens Meisterfeier: Wie im Drehbuch

description: Meisterschale, Rathausbalkon - und ein Abschiedstag mit großen Emotionen. Zum Karriereende von Weltmeister-Kapitän Philipp Lahm und Xabi Alonso will Rekordchampion FC Bayern München die rauschende Titelparty in rot-weiß mit einem Sieg gegen den SC Freiburg starten.
title: Fußball: Bayern-Party mit großen Emotionen
